import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios' const MovieContainer = ({movie}) => { const id = movie.params.id; const response = axios.get(`http://www.omdbapi.com/?apikey=ef3ac6ad&i=${id}`); console.log(response.data); return (

{movie.Title}

  • Genre: {movie.Genre}
  • Released: {movie.Released}
  • Rated: {movie.Rated}
  • IMDB Rating: {movie.imdbRating}
  • Director: {movie.Director}
  • Writer: {movie.Writer}
  • Actors: {movie.Actors}
Go Back To Search
) } export default MovieContainer
